mapper.select: SELECT rnum, review.mnum, onum, bnum, rcontent, rstar, rdate, rimg, rstatus_makey, rstatus_mikey, rcomment, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') strRdate, member.mnic FROM review INNER JOIN member ON review.mnum = member.mnum ORDER BY rnum;

SELECT rnum, review.mnum, onum, bnum, rcontent, rstar, rdate, rimg, rstatus_makey, rstatus_mikey, rcomment, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') strRdate, member.mnic FROM review INNER JOIN member ON review.mnum = member.mnum WHERE rnum = #{rnum};

SELECT o.mnum, o.bnum, o.onum, o.oaddr, o.otel, o.omsg, o.odate, o.ostatus_makey, o.ostatus_mikey, DATE_FORMAT(o.odate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') strOdate, r.rnum, r.rstatus_makey, r.rstatus_mikey, s.simg1, s.sname FROM ordering o LEFT JOIN review r ON o.onum = r.onum LEFT JOIN shop s ON o.bnum = s.bnum ORDER BY o.onum;

SELECT rnum, review.mnum, onum, bnum, rcontent, rstar, rdate, rimg, rstatus_makey, rstatus_mikey, rcomment, DATE_FORMAT(rdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') strRdate, member.mnic FROM review INNER JOIN member ON review.mnum = member.mnum WHERE rnum = #{rnum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review VALUES ((SELECT coalesce(max(a.rnum), 0)+1 FROM review a), #{mnum}, #{bnum}, #{onum}, #{rcontent}, #{rstar}, #{rdate}, #{rimg}, #{rstatus_makey}, #{rstatus_mikey}, #{rcomment});
